body:
Both you and the other parent will need to hire your own lawyer. A lawyer will be expensive so try and get a quote or ask if they offer a fixed fee for the collaborative process.

Some lawyers offer free 30-minute consultations or you can [check if you can get free legal help](https://www.lawworks.org.uk/legal-advice-individuals).
cost_description: Fees may vary depending on your location and the experience of the lawyer. How long you need will depend on your situation.
heading: Hire a lawyer
